artist.description: Name of the artist that illustrated the card art.

borderColor.description: Color of the border. Can be {{code:black}}, {{code:borderless}}, {{code:gold}}, {{code:silver}} or {{code:white}}.

colorIdentity.description: List of all colors in card’s mana

colorIndicator.description: List of all colors in card’s color indicator. Usually found only on cards without mana costs and other special cards.

colors.description: List of all colors in card’s mana cost and any color indicator.

duelDeck.description: If the card is in a duel deck product, can be {{code:a}}(left) or {{code:b}}(right).

isOnlineOnly.description: Is the token only available online?

layout.description: Type of card layout. Can be {{code:normal}}, {{code:split}}, {{code:flip}}, {{code:transform}}, {{code:meld}}, {{code:leveler}}, {{code:saga}}, {{code:planar}}, {{code:scheme}}, {{code:vanguard}}, {{code:token}}, {{code:double_faced_token}}, {{code:emblem}}, {{code:augment}} or {{code:host}}. (If normal, it is usually omitted.)

names.example: ["Nicol Bolas, the Ravager","Nicol Bolas, the Arisen"]
names.description: Names of each face on the card. Meld cards are listed in the order of {{code:CardA}}, {{code:Meld}}, {{code:CardB}}.

reverseRelated.description: List of cards in the same set which reference the token.

scryfallId.description: A universal unique ID (v4) generated by Scryfall. Note that cards with multiple faces are not unique.

scryfallOracleId.description: A unique ID for this card’s oracle identity. This value is consistent across reprinted card editions, and unique among different cards with the same name (tokens, Unstable variants, etc).

scryfallIllustrationId.description: A unique identifier for the card artwork that remains consistent across reprints. Newly spoiled cards may not have this field yet.

side.description: Identifier of the side. Used on cards with multiple faces, such as flip, split, transform cards. Can be {{code:a}}, {{code:b}}, or {{code:c}}.

type.description: Type of the token. Includes any supertypes and subtypes. Will have either Token or Emblem listed as a card type.

uuid.description: A universal unique ID (v5) generated by MTGJSON. Each entry is unique.

watermark.description: Name of the watermark on the card.
